Tee Times
About the Course
The Course
At 4,540 yardsfrom the tips the course’s length makes it a favorite with mature and ‘more experienced’ golfers, as well as newcomers to the sport.  A typically Floridian styled track, the open fairways of Mainlands are generally kind to those who may have a hard time finding the fairway.  Water comes into play on about half of the holes but with only two forced carries of under 100 yards each.
Tees That Fit your Game
Comprised of 7 Par 3’s, 9 Par 4’s and with a par 5 on each nine the course offers a little something for everyone.  A natural match for shorter hitters, Mainlands also teases longer drivers with the ability to drive the green on several of its par 4’s.  Both par 5’s, with a well placed drive, also tease for eagles.  So whether you smash a drive 300+ yards or whether you are just trying to duff your wood into the fairway the MGC has a variety of tee boxes to suit your individual game.  Golf is hard, don’t penalize yourself with tees that don’t fit your game.

In Honor of Veteran’s Day $5 from every entry fee donated to HEAVEN on EARTH for Veterans Inc.
Donuts, Danish, and light snacks for breakfast
Lunch is provided to all at the MGC FOOD TRUCK
LIVE MUSIC / DJ / KARAOKE
Goody Bags for all golfers, with giveaways, coupons, balls, tees, candy, raffle tickets and MORE.
Best Ball format, 4 person teams, prizes for top 3 teams, closest to pin, longest drive, AND…
3 FREE BEER tickets for every golfer!
Putting Contest from 11am – 12:30pm
COST is to be
$75.00 (+
tax)per person per tournament,
$275 if paying per foursome
if paid by 11/1/24.
Raffle for 1 year Membership at Mainlands Golf Course
Always one of the best days of the year.  We look forward to celebrating our anniversary and the veterans with you.
Register at the Proshop in person or over the phone.
